title: What are the different courses offered in the field of magnetism and hypnosis?
first_phrase: This text covers various courses offered by Dr. Paret's school that are focused on techniques related to Hermetic Magnetism, Hypno-mentalism, and Fascination. It primarily talks about the various methods used to harness the power of the mind and become a successful coach or operator. The last 200 tokens of the text cover the concepts of Fascination and Hypno-Magnetism, and talks about Dr. Paret's mentor, Prof. Erminio Di Pisa, who was an expert in instant hypnosis, instant healing, and parapsychic exploits. The text also mentions the lineage of Mesmer, Puysegur, Du Potet, and Durville from where many of these techniques were derived.
content: The roster of his patients, both Italians and foreigners, include the following: The winner of the Nobel Prize for peace Shimon Peres, King Hussein of Jordan, Margareth von Trotta, Maurizio Costanzo, Mariangela Melato, Bruno Zevi, Margherita Boniver, and Maurizio Ferrara. Fascination and Hypno-Magnetism: dr, Paret is a disciple of Prof. Erminio Di Pisa. Prof. Erminio di Pisa was a person marked by exceptional charm and energy. He specialized in instant hypnosis and in instant healing especially. He was also a medium (= a psychic). Though he lived and worked in Milan, he travelled abroad as well. He was for instance in South Korea following an invitation. Therein, he carried out experiments which drew a large crowd of people interested in them. He chaired the Astrological Association of the Light since 1973, and acted as director of the Centre of Instant Hypnosis. At the age of 14, he fully devoted himself to the study of hypnotic techniques. He has hypnotized more than 250.000 persons. For several years, both the Italian state-owned radio and television have shown us his parapsychic exploits: Collective hypnosis of a theatre audience, distance paranormal healing, announcing the final result of the “Corsa Tris”, a horseracing event, fifteen minutes before it even started, and so on. Mesmer. The method elaborated by F. A. Mesmer allows healing to take place quite rapidly, especially when a group is formed and symbols are utilized. Many techniques come from the lineage Mesmer ? Puysegur ?Du Potet ? Durville .
last_phrase: Join the global network of people interested in a comprehensive approach to inner development and research. Explore the fascinating field of animal magnetism and mesmerism, and connect with a network of institutions and individuals dedicated to personal development worldwide.
